alert.note: Alert for Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 26 at 7:49AM AKDT until March 26 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western Arctic Coast. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Blowing snow reducing visibility to one half mile or less at times. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions are improving this morning as snow tapers off, but could get worse again late tonight as another band of snow moves in.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
